titles.title: Puerto Rico Hospitals Medicare DSH Equity Act of 2004
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for equity in the calculation of Medicare disproportionate share hospital payments for hospitals in Puerto Rico.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 7/20/2004--Introduced. Puerto Rico Hospitals Medicare DSH Equity Act of 2004 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to include consideration of additional Medicare low-income patient populations served by Puerto Rico hospitals in the calculation of Medicare disproportionate share hospital (DSH) payments for prospective payment system hospitals in Puerto Rico.
